text: tum mein se jo log apni biwiyo se zihaar1 karte hai (yaani unhe maa keh baithte hai) wo dar asl un ki maaye nahi ban jaati, un ki maaye to wahi hai jin ke batan se wo payda hoye, yaqinan ye log ek na maqool aur jhooti baath kehte hai, beshak Allah taâ€™ala maaf karne waala aur baqshne waala hai
